name: Roll the Dice Please
description:
This is a game about some astronauts stuck in a strange island. They can only reach there rocket using portals. 

All portals has a key to open. Roll the dice and generate the key. 

Controls

Use AWSD to move the Dice. 

Use Q or E to switch between different dices. 

USE WINDOWS VERSION FOR BEST QUALITY

Arts & Sounds used 

Scene : https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/essential-low-poly-isometric-3d-block-and-hex-pac...

Rocket : https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/rocket-36ac04d6203545b1baf56c4cbf89349b

Trees : https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/lowpoly-forest-pack

Sounds : https://freesound.org/

Developed by Nehal V
